thread.title: Miss elaine o'connor
thread.title_full: Life Style Sports reviewed by Miss elaine o'connor

author: Miss elaine o'connor
title: Miss elaine o'connor
text: The staff in Newbridge store in the shopping centre were so helpful. It was a busy Sunday and they were so friendly and professional. My daughter wasn't sure of her size they got both 5 and 6. When the ones she wanted they ordered as they were not in stock and send they to our local store. Can't praise your staff enough in this store üòÅ well done
